mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO B_YH( N_XH, USER_ID, N_JB, N_YHZ, C_ZC, C_XM, N_XB, D_SR, C_GJ, C_CSD, C_HYZK, C_XL, C_BYYX, C_ZY, C_KH, C_HKSZD, C_DHHM, C_SJHM", C_YX, C_DZ, D_GZSJ, D_RZSJ, C_JCJL, C_BZ, N_DLCS, N_ZXSC, N_LX, C_YXIP )VALUES( SEQ_YH.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{nJb}, #{nYhz}, #{cZc}, #{cXm}, #{nXb}, to_date(#{dSr},,'YYYY-MM-DD') #{cGj}, #{cCsd}, #{cHyzk}, #{cXl}, #{cByyx}, #{cZy}, #{cKh}, #{cHkszd}, #{cDhhm}, #{cSjhm}, #{cYx}, #{cDz}, to_date(#{dGzsj},,'YYYY-MM-DD') to_date(#{dRzsj},,'YYYY-MM-DD') #{cJcjl}, #{cBz}, #{nDlcs}, to_date(#{nZxsc},,'YYYY-MM-DD') #{nLx} #{cYxip} )
SELECT SEQ_YH.CURRVAL AS ID FROM dual
